div.p: ‘Neoteris to my lord brother Phoebammon greeting. Since you have made …… in respect of my share … I have therefore executed this deed in your favour as I have received an equal share with my brother. I, Aurelia Neoteris the above-mentioned, have executed the deed. I, Aurelius John, advocate, councillor of Hermopolis, have written on her behalf as she is illiterate.’
